WorkPlace.Name: Workwide Danmark, Filial av Workwide AB i Sverige

HiringOrg.Name: Workwide Danmark, Filial av Workwide AB i Sverige

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about finding new jobs for others? If you also enjoy working in an international environment you might thrive working at Workwide Group. Join us and become part of our dedicated recruitment team, supporting candidates across Europe in finding jobs abroad. If this sounds thrilling for you, read more!

Workwide Group is a Sweden-based recruitment technology company founded in 2014 with a focus on helping people to find jobs abroad. Our project pipeline for 2022 has grown strongly and we are now ramping up our team. We are looking for an ambitious recruiter to serve our market with the recruitment of multilingual talent, mainly for junior or entry positions. 

 

About the job 

As a recruiter, you will have the overall responsibility for placing candidates for our clients. You will have tight cooperation with the sales team and clients directly. Daily work will primarily consist of coordinating adverts, communicating with either clients or candidates, and matching the last-mentioned with your clients' openings at different locations in Europe. To do this efficiently and successfully you need to be a digital native with good ability navigating in our ATS. The role will include:

  • Responsibility for recruiting multilingual talents from A to Z
  • To place candidates towards monthly targets
  • Provide excellent candidate and client experiences

 

Requirements

  • Excellent English language skills
  • A structured, organized approach to the work
  • Digital native, team player, and fast learner
  • Goal- and business-oriented with problem-solving capabilities
  • Lived and/or worked abroad

 

Desirable

  • Previous experiences from working in ATS or CRM
  • University degree – preferably in Communication, Business administration or Sales

 

We offer

  • Relocation package if you move from abroad (2 weeks accommodation, flight reimbursement)
  • A thorough introduction and industry training
  • Base salary and commission on revenue from placement feés
  • New modern office facility in the heart of Karlstad
  • Social events (dinners, ping-pong tournaments, After-Work activities, and more)
  • An individual development project is offered to all employees (5 hours/week)
  • Career development (i.e. Senior recruiter, Team Leader, Operation, or Recruitment Manager)
  • A tight team of engaged and dedicated colleagues from all over Europe
  • Wellness support
  • Life insurance

 

About Karlstad

Workwide Group is based in Karlstad, Sweden. Karlstad is a beautiful mid-sized town located right between Oslo, Gothenburg, and Stockholm. With rivers and canals flowing through this university town, plenty of bars, and restaurants it has the perfect mix between urban and nature, we’re sure you are going to like it here.

If you want to be a part of a small and promising company going into scale-up mode – apply today! Starting periods will be ongoing. 

 

We look forward to speaking with you!
